column3: News;Phnom Penh: Four women are in hospital after being trapped on the 4th floor of a building after a fire broke out at Khemerak Unversity.------Some of the women were reportedly injured after falling from the building
column4: after they climbed out of windows. They were taken to hospital by ambulance.------The University on Road No. 1986
column6: Khan Sen Sok reported the fire at 1:00 am
column9: who managed to control the blaze.------It apparently started in the parking area of the building. The cause and extent of the damage is not yet known.------More details later. ------TVFB------More photos: ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/291171
